page.title: 09FAMILY LIFE CONTINUED
page.content: The{*MASTER COPY*}shows the number of houses visited.It shows the results of the survey in Ansley. Of 110 families, 60 were villagers and 50 were incomers. 30 had stayed because of work in the local area, 50 because of social reasons and the others because of family reasons. Of course many said all three. The village still appears to have the community spirit of a small village, because when I called into a local shop there was a notice on the door thanking all of the people who contributed to a wreath for a local man who had died. Also there was to be a street party and requests were being made for assistance.
